Coverage outcomes
Low-certainty evidence suggests that PWGs may 
have little or no effect on ANC coverage of at least 
four visits (3 trials; RR: 1.05, 95% CI: 0.78–1.41), 
facility-based delivery (5 trials; RR: 1.04, 95% CI: 
0.89–1.22) and
